title: Best customer service ever!
text: We travel often, and stay in hotel several times a year. This is by far, the best hotel experience we've had our whole lives. The staff anticipates our needs and knows what we want before we even do. That is some true customer service skills! They have a truly impacted our weekend. This was not expected, but they have made this experience so memorable, I know that we will remember this for decades to come. Please keep providing this service!
